Package main.java.it.unipr.client

Class App

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
main.java.it.unipr.client.App
public class App extends javafx.application.Application
The class App defines the management of application pages using FXML files.
Author:
Martina Gualtieri <martina.gualtieri@studenti.unipr.it>, Cristian Cervellera <cristian.cervellera@studenti.unipr.it>

    • initFirstPage

      public void initFirstPage()
      Initializes the first page with the logo and the name of the application. Also calls the initLogin() method to show the login section.

    • initLogout

      public void initLogout()
      Initializes the logout. It sets the user to null and calls the login page initialization method.

      Initializes the login section.

    • isSuccessfulMessage

      public boolean isSuccessfulMessage(ResponseType messageType)
      Gets whether the message is successful or not. Also calls the showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) method to open an alert box containing the message.
      Parameters:
      messageType - the type of message
      Returns:
      true if the message is successful.

      Sets the visibility of an element.
      Parameters:

      visible - true if the element is to be visible on the page.
